name: jetton-minter-2.0
description: Jetton 2.0 Minter - Create your own tokens on TON blockchain

scripts.compile:minter: func -o build/jetton-minter.fif -SPA contracts/imports/stdlib.fc contracts/imports/op-codes.fc contracts/imports/jetton-params.fc contracts/jetton-minter.fc
scripts.compile:wallet: func -o build/jetton-wallet.fif -SPA contracts/imports/stdlib.fc contracts/imports/op-codes.fc contracts/imports/jetton-params.fc contracts/jetton-wallet.fc
